plugin.name: PlayDSD
plugin.title: PlayDSD
plugin.desc: Playback of DSD files (.dsf and .dff) via you Squeezebox. Supports conversion to PCM or playback as DSD-over-PCM (DoP) for DACs supporting DoP.
plugin.creator: Kimmo, Triode
